    • TextUI

  • Method Details

    • go

      public void go​(SNIDApp app)
      A constructor for the TextUI class. Takes in a SNIDApp object. Creates the User Command Line Interface in which: New Citizen's Information can be entered, Citizen's Information can be updated, Ability to locate a citizen, Files for marriages and deaths are created, and Citizen's main files are updated. Text Command Line Interface is only closed when the User select the specific command to close the interface.
      Parameters:
      app - The SNIDApp object that interacts directly with the Text Command Line Interface

    • convertDate

      public java.lang.String convertDate​(java.lang.String date)
      A method to convert a date given in the format(DD/MM/YYYY).
      Parameters:
      date - A string representing a date given in the format (DD/MM/YYYY)
      Returns:
      A string representation of the given date in the format (Month Day, Year)

    • isLeap

      public boolean isLeap​(int year)
      A method to check if a given year(integer) is a Leap Year.
      Parameters:
      year - An integer representation of the year to be verified
      Returns:
      A boolean to signify if a year is a leap year

    • isValidDate

      public boolean isValidDate​(java.lang.String date, int type)
      A method to verify if a date in the given format is a valid date. It checks if the given date matches the given format, false is return if it doesn't. When the type is equal to 1, it checks if the year of the given date is before a citizen's birth year, this is done for when converting the date a citizen die. False is return if it less than the birth year. When the type is equal to 2, it checks if the year of the given date is before each citizen birth year, this is done for when converting the date two citizens marry. False is return if it less than any one of the citizen's birth year. False is return if the given date is before the year 1400 and if it is after the year 9999.
      Parameters:
      date - String representation of the date in the format (DD/MM/YYYY)
      type - An Integer to signify which operation the given date is to undertake, 1 for a death date, 0 for a marriage date
      Returns:
      A boolean signifying the validity of the given date
